proxy.addProxies: Add more proxies t' yer crew!

dialog.title: Bring in {{type}} proxies, arr!
dialog.description: Paste yer proxies here, one per scrap o' parchment

removeToast.success: Sent {{count}} proxies t' Davy Jones' locker!
removeToast.error: Failed t'remove them proxies, ye scurvy dog!

checkDialog.title: Check Proxies, hoist the lantern!
checkDialog.description: Yer about t' check {{count}} proxies. Bad proxies walk the plank, automatically.

proxy.invalidFormat: That be an invalid proxy format, yarrr!
proxy.removeSelectedTooltip: Toss chosen proxies t' the deep!
proxy.exportSelectedTooltip: Export chosen proxies t' treasure map!

contextMenu.deleteProxy: Delete Proxy, make 'em walk the plank!

postImportCheckDialog.title: Check Proxies, savvy?
postImportCheckDialog.description: Just pulled {{count}} proxies aboard. Shall we check 'em now? Bad ones walk the plank.

listImportToast.allFailed: Arr, failed t'be importin' any accounts!
listImportToast.someFailed: Imported {{count}} accounts, but {{failed}} be refusin' t'board, matey!
listImportToast.error: Arr, failed t'be importin' accounts, ye landlubber!
listImportToast.noAccounts: No accounts t'be importin', ye barnacle.

deviceCodeImportToast.error: Couldn't drag the account aboard, matey!

generate.title: Be manufacturin' Offline Accounts
generate.description: Spawn offline Java accounts with a secret name code, arrr.
generate.nameFormatHelp: Use %d as a stand-in fer the account number (like, Bot_%d becomes Bot_1, Bot_2, and the like)
generate.modeHelp:
Pick how t' handle them stashed accounts:

• Ignore Existin': Only creates accounts not already aboard. The rest stay.

• Replace Existin': Makes all accounts, swappin' any with the same Pirate ID. Others stay put.

• Replace All: Casts ALL old accounts overboard, replacin' 'em with the new ones.
generate.allFailed: Couldn't make a single account, arrr!
generate.allExist: All usernames be on deck already. Allow 'Override existin' accounts' to bring 'em back, yarrr.
generate.invalidAmount: Give us a proper amount (at least 1 piece o' eight)
generate.missingPlaceholder: Name chart must fly the %d flag, matey!

dialog.title: Bring in {{type}} accounts, hoist the sails!
dialog.description: Paste yer accounts here, one per line o' rope

removeToast.success: Tossed {{count}} accounts to the briny deep!
removeToast.error: Couldn't toss them accounts, shiver me timbers!

config.title: Rig {{name}} fer sailin'
config.description: Set per-bot gear fer this account
config.noSettings: No ship's settings fer this page, matey

deviceCodeDialog.title: Device Code Authentication
deviceCodeDialog.description: Hoist yer sails 'n sign in with yer Microsoft account to be hookin' it up.
deviceCodeDialog.orManually: Or enter the code by hand, matey

metadata.title: Metadata: {{name}}
metadata.description: Manage yer metadata booty fer this account. Each trinket needs a namespace, key, and JSON value.
metadata.noEntries: No metadata trinkets. Add one up top!
metadata.duplicateError: A trinket with that seaspace and key be 'ere already, arrr!

bots.onlineCount: {{online}} hands on deck / {{total}} in the fleet
bots.noBots: No bots are manning the decks. Add accounts in Account Settings, ye lazy barnacle.
bots.noBotsFound: No sea dogs match yer search.
bots.allLoaded: All {{total}} bots be looted and loaded!

positionPanel.title: Placement & Spin o' th' Ship
positionPanel.offline: Bot's off th' seas. Position be seen only with bot aboard.

chatPanel.title: Scribblin's from Chat
chatPanel.description: Bot's chat scribblin's be docked here on future tides.

commandPanel.title: Parrot Commands
commandPanel.placeholder: Send order t' this sea dog...
commandPanel.description: Parrot-bound commands comin' in a future update. Prepare for the call.

povPanel.title: Bot's Stare
povPanel.startAutoRefresh: Begin auto-refilling the spyglass (1 tick a second)
povPanel.clickToCapture: Click Capture to glimpse the bot's spyglass view, arrr
povPanel.offline: Bot's off the seas. Can't see nothin' till she be aboard.

statsPanel.title: Bot Ledger
statsPanel.offline: Bot's off th' seas. Charts be blacked out.

inventoryPanel.title: Cargo Hold
inventoryPanel.clickHint: Left-click: pillage/drop | Right-click: half/one | Shift+click: quick snatch | Middle-click: grab hotbar slot
inventoryPanel.offline: Bot's off th' seas. Cargo's hidden.

visualPanel.title: Bot's View
visualPanel.offline: Bot's lost at sea. Nothin' visual yet.

actionsPanel.title: Parrot Maneuvers
actionsPanel.offline: Bot's off deck. Actions be cut off till it returns.

dialogPanel.title: Ship's Banter Box
dialogPanel.noDialog: No ship's banter t'hear yet, mate.
dialogPanel.offline: Bot drifted off. Banter's gone silent.

scripts.title: Visual Spell Scrolls
scripts.description: Make yer automation with magic node-maps, ye scallywag!
scripts.experimentalWarning: This magic be experimental. Might change with the tides and break yer spells. Beware!
scripts.createScriptDescription: Craft a new visual spell script fer this voyage. Spells can automate yer actions and answer to the sea.
scripts.scriptDescriptionPlaceholder: Say what this spell conjures up...
scripts.noScriptsDescription: Craft yer very first spell t'charm yer bots with the magic of nodes!
scripts.saveFirstBeforeActivating: Save the spell first ‘fore pumpin’ her full o’ magic!
scripts.deactivatedByUser: Spell sunk by yer own hand!

toolbar.zoomIn: Zoom in close with yer glass
toolbar.zoomOut: Zoom out, see th' broad seas
toolbar.exportSuccess: Spell sent across the seas, aye!
toolbar.importSuccess: Spell brought aboard with no trouble!
toolbar.importError: Failed to fetch the spell, arrr!

logs.title: Logs o' Sorcery
logs.noLogs: No logs yet. Run the spell and see the parchments pile up.
